title: The 49ers Run Away With the NFC, and Mahomes Snaps a 50-Year Drought for the Chiefs | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The 49ers leave no doubt as to whether they are the best team in the NFC by dominating the Packers and throwing the ball only eight times (2:40). They will face Patrick Mahomes and a potent Kansas City Chiefs offense who outperformed an impressive Titans team. Plus Richard Sherman’s Twitter pettiness continues to delight us (21:45).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
